definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages

sentences.english: Sony stops selling tape Walkman in Japan after 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 索尼宣佈在日本停售磁帶隨身聽。

sentences.english: I have one USA version PCDP from Panasonic.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個美版的松下隨身聽。

sentences.english: Another idea would be to gift her with a walkman and a few of her favorite songs.
sentences.chinese: 另外，隨身聽和幾首她最愛的歌曲也是份好禮物。

sentences.english: With the convenient and stylish Wireless Walkman say farewell to troublesome headphone cables.
sentences.chinese: 一款便利和時尚無線隨身聽，給惱人的耳機線說再見。

sentences.english: You need a new walkman and you need some money.
sentences.chinese: 你想買個隨身聽而且你需要錢。

sentences.english: I've had numerous walkmans and this is the best.
sentences.chinese: 我有很多隨身聽，這是最好的。

sentences.english: Walkman almost broke my young heart.
sentences.chinese: 隨身聽，差點碰碎一顆年輕的心。

sentences.english: Until that moment, he had been happily listen to his walkman.
sentences.chinese: 其實他一直在聽着隨身聽。

sentences.english: This walkman only needs one battery.
sentences.chinese: 這款隨身聽只需要一節電池。

sentences.english: Can you show me the Walkman, please?
sentences.chinese: 請給我看看那隨身聽好嗎？

sentences.english: If you want to buy a walkman, you can go to an electrical shop.
sentences.chinese: 假如你想買一個隨身聽，你可以去電器店。

sentences.english: Another idea would be to gift her walkman and a few of her favorite songs.
sentences.chinese: 另外，隨身聽和幾首她最愛的歌曲也是份好禮物。

sentences.english: Who would have predicted the success of hand-held digital audio players?
sentences.chinese: 誰想得到手持式數位隨身聽的成功？

sentences.english: We are cabling you our new price for our "AIWA" Brand Walkman.
sentences.chinese: 現電傳給貴方我方愛華牌隨身聽的新價格。

sentences.english: I like music, and I like this walkman, too.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡音樂，我也喜歡這個隨身聽。
我買了一臺新的隨身聽。

definition: alarm (e.g. burglar or fire alarm)/warning device
CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
to return something to its rightful owner
